        <general>
          <identifier>

            <entry>cahi1:data_99d9fae97d14b84ce4486ea04774105c54765791</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field lines around a current-carrying wire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen um eine 
aktuell-tragende Leitung auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Lignes de champ magnétique autour d'un fil 
actuel-portant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Linhas do campo magnético em torno de um fio 
atual-carregando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Righe del campo magnetico intorno ad un legare 
corrente-trasportante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Γραμμές μαγνητικών πεδίων γύρω από ένα 
παρών-φέρνοντας καλώδιο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Líneas del campo magnético alrededor de un 
alambre actual-que lleva</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations compare the direction of magnetic field lines around a current-carrying wire (left) to the turning direction of a corkscrew (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">current flow</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">direction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field lines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic fields</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wire</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen vergleichen die Richtung von 
magnetischem auffangen Zeilen um eine aktuell-tragende 
Leitung (link) zur drehenrichtung eines Korkenziehers (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations comparent la direction des 
lignes de champ magnétique autour d'un fil actuel-portant (gauche) à
la direction de rotation d'un tire-bouchon (droit).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações comparam o sentido de linhas 
do campo magnético em torno de um fio atual-carregando (esquerdo) ao 
sentido de giro de um corkscrew (direito).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni confrontano il senso delle 
righe del campo magnetico intorno ad un legare corrente-trasportante 
(di sinistra) al senso di rotazione di un corkscrew (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις συγκρίνουν την κατεύθυνση των 
γραμμών μαγνητικών πεδίων γύρω από ένα παρών-φέρνοντας 
καλώδιο (αριστερό) με τη γυρίζοντας κατεύθυνση ενός ανοιχτήρι 
(δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones comparan la dirección de las
líneas del campo magnético alrededor de un alambre actual-que lleva 
(izquierdo) a la dirección que da vuelta de un sacacorchos (derecho).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">aktueller Fluß</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Richtung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">magnetisch fangen Sie Zeilen auf</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
